name: Ancient Viking
description:
Ancient viking: A story about a fiery viking who came from the mountains to help ordinary people. The world is filled with chaos, monsters and there is no one to help with it.
Arm yourself with a magic book and go to destroy the monsters, but be careful, the enemies are not asleep.

The tough and harsh life of a medieval Viking awaits you: travel through locations filled with enemies, complete tasks, fight and buy from merchants.

Ancient viking is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Destroy enemies on the location and complete the set goal to go further along the storyline.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Interesting tasks
- Many locations
- Good soundtrack
